sentences.en: A button was missing from his shirt.
sentences.cn: 他的衬衫上掉了一颗纽扣。

sentences.en: Anyone can sew on a button, including you.
sentences.cn: 任何人都能缝纽扣，包括你。

sentences.en: Click on the icon with the right mouse button .
sentences.cn: 用鼠标右键点击图标。

sentences.en: don't allow co-workers to push your buttons.
sentences.cn: 别让你的同事牵着你的鼻子走。

sentences.en: He pushed the play button again and ran the tape.
sentences.cn: 他又按下了播放键播放磁带。

sentences.cn: 他伸手拿过遥控器，按下“播放”键。

sentences.cn: 我一疏忽按错了按钮。

sentences.cn: 我会打补丁，缝纽扣。

sentences.cn: 我坐下来，穿好针，剪下一枚旧纽扣。

sentences.cn: 弹压民意真是太专制了。

sentences.cn: 只要把照相机对准，然后按动快门就可以了。

sentences.cn: 大多数上衣 、 夹克或衬衫都在前面扣扣.

sentences.en: Press the pause button.
sentences.cn: 按暂停键。

sentences.en: Press the rewind button.
sentences.cn: 按下倒带键。

sentences.en: Sam, make sure Nina buttons up her jacket.
sentences.cn: 萨姆，要让尼娜把上衣扣好。

sentences.en: She undid (=  unfastened  ) the buttons of her blouse.
sentences.cn: 她解开衬衫的纽扣。

sentences.cn: 小的珍珠纽扣

sentences.en: The autoexposure button is awkwardly placed under the lens release button.
sentences.cn: 自动曝光按钮安装在镜头脱卸按钮下面，十分不便。

sentences.en: The button on his jeans went POP.
sentences.cn: 他牛仔服上的纽扣发出“啪”的响声。

sentences.en: The fuse blew as he pressed the button to start the motor.
sentences.cn: 他按下按钮启动马达的时候保险丝烧断了。

sentences.en: The fuse blew as he pressed the button.
sentences.cn: 他刚一按下按钮，保险丝就烧断了。

sentences.en: The middle button of his uniform jacket was strained over his belly.
sentences.cn: 制服上装中间的纽扣在他的肚子上绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: trying to button up a deal.
sentences.cn: 试图做成一笔交易。

sentences.en: You just press the button and, hey presto, a perfect cup of coffee!
sentences.cn: 只要按下按钮，嘿，马上就出来一杯上好的咖啡！

扣住；装有钮扣；扣上钮扣

停止按钮；制动按钮；停车按钮

trans.tran_en: a small round flat object on your shirt, coat etc that you pass through a hole to fasten it
to fasten clothes with buttons, or to be fastened with buttons
